title: Fresh Ground
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe bistro owned by a vegetarian and the the menu always includes a range of vegetarian and vegan choices such as their daily specials, vegetarian burger, and a range of snacks, and tapas. Free Wi-Fi. Hosts occasional jazz evenings and other musical events.
